scripts.build:lib: npm run -w @doggo/router build && npm run -w @doggo/game-random build && npm run -w @doggo/card-game build && npm run -w @doggo/app-with-web3 build && npm run -w @doggo/app-main-menu build && npm run -w @doggo/app-inventory build && npm run -w @doggo/app-play build && npm run -w @doggo/app-trade build && npm run -w @doggo/app-social build && npm run -w @doggo/app-challenges build && npm run -w @doggo/app-mint build && npm run -w @doggo/app-become-member build && npm run -w @doggo/app-check-membership build && npm run -w @doggo/events build && npm run -w @doggo/ecs build && npm run -w @doggo/base-game build && npm run -w @doggo/arena build && npm run -w @doggo/explosion build && npm run -w @doggo/airplane build && npm run -w @doggo/ai build && npm run -w @doggo/match-game build && npm run -w @doggo/training-game build && npm run -w @doggo/app-train build && npm run -w @doggo/app-match build
scripts.build:product: npm run -w @doggo/web build && npm run -w @doggo/electron build && npm run -w @doggo/cli build
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:product
scripts.watch:lib: concurrently "npm run -w @doggo/router watch" "npm run -w @doggo/game-random watch" "npm run -w @doggo/card-game watch" "npm run -w @doggo/app-with-web3 watch" "npm run -w @doggo/app-main-menu watch" "npm run -w @doggo/app-inventory watch" "npm run -w @doggo/app-play watch" "npm run -w @doggo/app-trade watch" "npm run -w @doggo/app-social watch" "npm run -w @doggo/app-challenges watch" "npm run -w @doggo/app-mint watch" "npm run -w @doggo/app-become-member watch" "npm run -w @doggo/app-check-membership watch" "npm run -w @doggo/events watch" "npm run -w @doggo/ecs watch" "npm run -w @doggo/base-game watch" "npm run -w @doggo/arena watch" "npm run -w @doggo/explosion watch" "npm run -w @doggo/airplane watch" "npm run -w @doggo/ai watch" "npm run -w @doggo/match-game watch" "npm run -w @doggo/training-game watch" "npm run -w @doggo/app-train watch" "npm run -w @doggo/app-match watch"
scripts.watch:product: concurrently "npm run -w @doggo/web watch" "npm run -w @doggo/electron watch" "npm run -w @doggo/cli watch"
scripts.watch: npm run build:contracts && npm run watch:product
scripts.clean:lib: concurrently "npm run -w @doggo/router clean" "npm run -w @doggo/game-random clean" "npm run -w @doggo/card-game clean" "npm run -w @doggo/app-with-web3 clean" "npm run -w @doggo/app-main-menu clean" "npm run -w @doggo/app-inventory clean" "npm run -w @doggo/app-play clean" "npm run -w @doggo/app-trade clean" "npm run -w @doggo/app-social clean" "npm run -w @doggo/app-challenges clean" "npm run -w @doggo/app-mint clean" "npm run -w @doggo/app-become-member clean" "npm run -w @doggo/app-check-membership clean" "npm run -w @doggo/events clean" "npm run -w @doggo/ecs clean" "npm run -w @doggo/base-game clean" "npm run -w @doggo/arena clean" "npm run -w @doggo/explosion clean" "npm run -w @doggo/airplane clean" "npm run -w @doggo/ai clean" "npm run -w @doggo/match-game clean" "npm run -w @doggo/training-game clean" "npm run -w @doggo/app-train clean" "npm run -w @doggo/app-match clean"
scripts.clean:product: concurrently "npm run -w @doggo/web clean" "npm run -w @doggo/electron clean" "npm run -w @doggo/cli clean"
scripts.serve:product: concurrently "npm run -w @doggo/web serve" "npm run -w @doggo/electron serve" "npm run -w @doggo/cli serve"
